name: The Second One
description:
WARNING: Because of browser limitations and how the game's engine is built, you may have to click so that sounds reproduce. This kinda ruins the experience -I know- because I had each sound time with what was going on on the screen. If you want the full experience, download the Windows version. Sorry!

This game uses both themes, "Dead giveaway" and "The second one" and was made for the Fam Jam N°5. While it is quite complete, I'd love to keep updating it and deepen some mechanics. Hope you enjoy it!

 "The Second One" is a short game, where you play as a lazy boyfriend that can't (or just won't) make full sentences for questions that can simply be answered with two simple options. Go through the night with these verbal limitations and make your girlfriend happy, having as reference the bar on the right. 3 different endings and maybe a reward for completing them all. 

USE HEADPHONES, the kind you like...
